data.title: Wonderful Venue & Team!
data.quote: The venue is beautiful - lots of our guests commented on the fun, unique set-up in the market, the quality of food and drink, and the wonderful atmosphere. We couldnƒ?Tt recommend it enough!
data.author: Matt & Jess

data.title: The Most Incredible Day Of Our Lives
data.quote: The team made everything feel absolutely seamless; our guests could not and still cannot stop going on about how much they loved both TOTS and Malt, and we still feel exactly the same. We could not have hoped for a better night and that is all thanks to you!
data.author: Jimmi & Sam

data.title: Incredible Day - Beyond Expectation
data.quote: From the moment we discovered this venue, we absolutely fell in love with it. If you're looking for a relatively intimate venue in a unique and cozy setting, then this is without a doubt the place for you.
data.author: Samantha & James

data.title: Romantic And Fun
data.quote: We were incredibly privileged to be the first wedding at Maltby Street Market. Working with Ian was such a fun and easy experience, and we were offered some fantastic suggestions along the way to make the day run smoothly. Our guests commented that it was the most romantic and fun wedding they had ever attended.
data.author: Matt & Amanda

data.title: An Eclectic And Vibrant Mix
data.quote: The venue itself, a busy London street market, was unique; an eclectic and vibrant mix of colour and charm allowing us to have the most beautiful photography and cherished memories for a long time to come. We also worked with Jemima (Jemima in the Woods) for the flowers which were very beautiful. The food was stunning and the traders a real pleasure to work with.
data.author: Ben & Patricia
